ygData.subject: Re: Anthem and warsong (was: Macro setup for bards)
ygData.msgSnippet: From: John Kim  ... Ok, I tested this last night.  At L18, Warsong was only boosting my AC by 3.  Guardian rhythms without a drum boosts it
ygData.messageBody:
From: John Kim <kim@...>
>
>Warsong also gives you a pretty good bonus to AC, which can be
>useful even in a group (since most mobs end up attacking the
>bard).

Ok, I tested this last night. At L18, Warsong was only
boosting my AC by 3. Guardian rhythms without a drum boosts
it by 4, raises your magic resist, and helps your entire
party.

So I'm changing my tactics. The only time I'll twist Warsong
if I'm grouped is if I'm the only or one of two tanks and we
really need the 5% extra damage it gives me. Otherwise it's
a mix of Anthem, Bellow, Guardian, Elemental, and Hymn.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
